thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pixelworks Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.10

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pixelworks Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.10
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Pixelworks Inc:
* PIXELWORKS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.10 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $14.5 MILLION TO $15.5 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $18.4 MILLION VERSUS $16 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.02, REVENUE VIEW $18.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $16.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
